com.datastax.oss.dsbulk.connectors.commons

Interface AbstractFileBasedConnector.RecordReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractFileBasedConnector

    protected static interface AbstractFileBasedConnector.RecordReader
extends AutoCloseable
    A reader for Records. Implementors are not expected to deal with thread-safety issues, these are handled by this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the underlying file being read.
      AbstractFileBasedConnector.RecordReader readNext(SynchronousSink<Record> sink)
      Reads the next record and emits the record to the sink, if any.

    • Method Detail

      • readNext

        @NonNull
AbstractFileBasedConnector.RecordReader readNext(@NonNull
                                                          SynchronousSink<Record> sink)
        Reads the next record and emits the record to the sink, if any. It may also signal completion, if there are no more records to be read, or an error if the next record cannot be parsed.

        This method must never throw; any error should be signaled to the sink.

        Parameters:
        sink - The SynchronousSink that will receive the parsed record, or a termination signal.
        Returns:
        this reader.

      • close

        void close()
    throws IOException
        Closes the underlying file being read. Once this method is called, it is guaranteed that readNext(SynchronousSink) will not be called anymore.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs while closing.
